<title>Pier Sixty | Waterfront Event Venue at Chelsea Piers, NYC</title>
<meta name="description" content="Host your next event at Pier Sixty, NYC’s most inspirational venue. With a capacity for 1,200 guests for dinner, stunning Hudson River views, and world-class service, it's the perfect wedding, gala, and conference destination." />
